titleStmt.title: A speech made in the House of Peeres by the Right Honourable the Earl of Monmouth on Thursday the 13 of Ianuary 1641 upon the occasion of the present distractions and of His Majesties removall from White- hall.
titleStmt.author: Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
